alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:11PM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 PM this afternoon and 4 AM Thursday of 5 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Osburn, Lookout Pass, St. Maries, Pinehurst, Mullan, Fourth Of July Pass, Kellogg, Wallace, Dobson Pass, and Fernwood. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates of 1 inch per hour is expected during the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.
